column97:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
Write an email to a friend who is planning to visit your country for the first time. In your letter:
Recommend the best time of year to visit
Suggest some places they should see
Offer advice about what to bring
Write at least 150 words.
—-------------—-------------—-------------—-------------—-------------—-------------—-
FOR TEACHERS ONLY
Marking Criteria:
Task Achievement (3 marks): How well you respond to all parts of the task and provide clear, relevant information.
Coherence and Cohesion (2 marks): How logically your ideas are organized and connected.
Lexical Resource (2 marks): The range and accuracy of vocabulary used.
Grammatical Range and Accuracy (3 marks): The range and accuracy of grammatical structures used.

column97:
From: nasrinbashardost1@gmail.com
To: safina.rehmat1115@gmail.com
Subject: advice for friend

Dear Safin,
I hope you are doing well, and great with your respectful family.
I am writing this e mail to give you some advices which are really essential for you to know that what should you do when you come here.

Honestly speaking, I am extremely delighted that you are coming to my country, as I was waiting for for a long time.
Firstly, the best time to  come here is summer because the  weather is cool, every places are green which are completely relaxing fresh and you will enjoy.

Actually, in here we have many beautiful places which are good for vacation and picnic 
like, Mazar Sharif, Beeman, takht rustam , and kabul,
whren you come here we will go all this places.

Well, in my country the weather is really cold, so you should bring some warm clothes, boots, and some afghani clothes   for yourself like Gand afghani, lebas hazaragi, and something like this.

At the end I am really happy about your decision that you want to come here 
also remember to come with your family 

I am waiting for your response

Best regard,

Nasrin bashardost
column99: The email addresses all parts of the task but lacks clarity and some relevant details, affecting task achievement. Ideas are logically organized but transitions are weak, impacting coherence. Vocabulary is adequate but repetitive and sometimes inaccurate. Grammar shows frequent errors and limited structural variety, reducing overall accuracy and range.

Dear,shabana
I hope you are doing well. I want to tell some thing, when you want to visit me first tell me the date and if you come in December is well because this month weather cold and you broing warm clothes .

When you come I will show you bamyan, because it has beautiful place  like big moumty and band-e-amit.

so  when you come here remember to bring some warm clothes, for yourself due to the weather is really cold
column99: The email addresses some parts of the task but misses clarity and detail. The recommendation to visit in December is given but not well explained, and the places suggested lack description. Advice about what to bring is repeated but worded awkwardly. There are organizational issues and frequent grammatical errors that impede understanding, and vocabulary is limited and occasionally incorrect. Improvement in coherence, richer vocabulary, and grammatical accuracy are needed.
